answers.answer: You could have Preeclampsia. My cousin had it with her first baby and the symptoms are swelling of the hands/feet/face. I would ask your doctor what's wrong because it could be very harmful to you and your baby.

I have an appt tmrw but it seems to have gotten worse over the past cpl day... did your cousin have high blood pressure? I know that's the main symptom of preclampsia but idk if you have to have high bp to have preclampsia?

Not always. If you normally have low blood pressure pre pregnancy and it is now in the normal range but you also have protein in your urine it could be pre-e. Normally my bp is 120/60 but it has been 140/86 for the last week so they are watching me. It could also be dehydration induced water retention. If you aren't drinking enough water then your body holds water to try and make up for the imbalance, kind of like a camel lol.
That could be a possibility... I probably don't drink as much as a should!
My swelling was so bad my feet would get kinda numb. My doctor told me to stop working and I was half way put on bed rest. He wanted to lay on my left side a lot and drink A LOT of water

I've heard pit edema causes the dent like on the swelling... I too have been suffering from swelling and I don't do anything I'm on bed rest. My blood pressure is up and down my doctor told me I have toxemia which is not yet preeclampsia... I have to be monitored weekly for my son's sake, if he's distressed he will take me ASAP... So. They will most likely do blood tests and 24 hr urine to check for protein..

I'm still working and it seems to get worse when I'm at work... even tho I sit all day basically but I heard that was not good either. I guess I will have to see what the dr says tmrw. Thanks for the answers :)

question: So latetlty I've been having some severe swelling in my feet/ankles/calves/fingers. Occasionally my heart races and I also get very short of breath. My swelling is to the point where if I push on my foot or ankle or shin it leaves a dent. I don't have high blood pressure (I check it once every cpl days) but I don't understand why I'm swelling so much... anyone elae have this and had there dr tell them why?
title: swelling
